text: If anyone else can help with the above that would be great, I’ve had some people that haven’t read the requirements :confused:
hi <@U038JB86KAT> if its about development workflow, have you checked this? <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/guides/github-integration>

Sure I’ve checked that <@UCH1L597V>

I think the problem I’m having is that my team are working on the same portal account and theme, so when they use hs fetch command they are bringing in new changes outside of git (from the design editor)

Does everyone who works on a team, use a separate sandbox outside of the same portal/theme?
